info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 27 at 12:59PM PDT by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Umatilla County through 130 PM PDT... At 1258 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over northwestern Umatilla Reservation, or 9 miles southeast of Pendleton, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Athena, Weston, Adams, Thorn Hollow, Cayuse, Umatilla Reservation, Bingham Springs, Mission and Gibbon. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
